= !StdErr property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

*Class:* _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

*Introduced:* v1.0

{{{
property StdErr: THandle;
}}}

== Description ==

The _!StdErr_ property specifies a console application's standard error handle. The program will write standard error output to the specified handle. Leave as 0 (the default) if standard error is not to be redirected. To redirect output set the property to a valid *inheritable* handle.
